price: (Ibliis) ni jedhe: “Anatu isarra caala; ana ibidda irraa na uumte, isa immoo suphee (horofa) irraa isa uumte.”
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
